title: Uni Retail Platform (URP)

Integrated Borderline Genius API for real-time US duty and tariff calculations on HTS codes. Built Retool-based analytics dashboards and optimized pickup flows with serviceability filtering.

Tuned MongoDB sharding for 25% latency reduction. Migrated retry systems to Kafka and designed real-time event syncing for CommerceTools/Algolia. Rebuilt loyalty system (TalonOne) and integrated headless checkout (Bold Commerce).
